A great game with a ranked twist, may be old but still a gem!

No smokin' hot babes

I got into Apex Legends when Loba was released, Fortnite always had hawt babes too, but despite being released close to ten years ago, all this game has to offer is the occasional soundbite from a fully clothed (baggy tactical gear) operator that sounds like a mom planning to pick you up from your friends house at 9pm. 

1/5 stars. Needs more babes.

It's the GOAT of tactical shooters. If you're a fan of the genre this is an actual must play.

Good competitive game, i had lots of fun playing this game, but i got VAC, with i truely did deserve since i used a cheat. but i do totally recommend playing, especially while playing with some friends, so you can get the most out of it.
